Recent updates in New York City include a fire injuring six at a Bronx housing complex, eight hospitalized from a carbon monoxide leak in Brooklyn, and ongoing concerns about highly pathogenic avian influenza as well as a significant fentanyl seizure in the Bronx.

### Risks & Alerts

- Six injured in fire at Bronx housing complex; cause under investigation. [↗](https://news.google.com/rss/articles/CBMijAFBVV95cUxNSFY3VmZQZlZ3ZkRmeTVPbXduclhJRmR2cC04dnlHcS1xcDBKS3BERmFYZkhHdENqMFBtT3BwTnYtQ1lfTHE2a0dCWkVabFQ1bWQ1LWZWLWg2cy1tQmxNcUNUWlFzMHhybmpfQXVfVTFBZ3dHVmhLUktUWHJEZHppMnRBOWN4VWN2bVJwTQ?oc=5)
- Eight hospitalized after carbon monoxide leak at Gravesend home; residents advised to check detectors. [↗](https://news.google.com/rss/articles/CBMioAFBVV95cUxOdkY0Q1pBVGFkeW5YTWNycnBDNW1sQlg5S2tmYi1UQjZmVmx2bFNjRWZ6dXpxaXk3UkRCbkdCZ0FCTmdjTlhHc1N1dG9rRlVaQlhyb0dpT0RtSUwxRlJUTlZhZXlySmpIeEJtbHhEYXhJc2IxSnB4SnJZYmdSYzRyRlpFUTA5cm1iME9ZZzlDdWlSZy0teV9yd1Nmd1ZONEhf?oc=5)
- DEC warns New Yorkers to stay alert for highly pathogenic avian influenza; avoid contact with sick birds. - No injuries reported after partial building collapse in the Bronx; structural integrity under review. [↗](https://news.google.com/rss/articles/CBMiqgFBVV95cUxOekJDUFE3N2hKcjA5YTF4ODliYnZHNVVQNEtLUGdKS0xxQ0c5T1FmZzQ0ZXRibFA4d3pyNm5aaUtzaVBoQmNsTmgxZ3lOODduX2R4NnIzbnhESi0xYWZwS0pQZU9XWGFSSkJVLVF5MUhMUXZRbXQ3VkNSN2xJY0Vybk02WTZEUDQzeXh2SmI4TllfMXZObGJRbmJrRE5sR3kxa2h6UGNLTmlBZw?oc=5)

- Highly contagious 'super flu' reported in NYC; residents advised to monitor symptoms and seek medical attention. [↗](https://news.google.?oc=5)

### Opportunities & Welfare

- MetroPlusHealth survey reveals New Yorkers struggle to balance health care costs with living expenses. [↗](https://news.google.?oc=5)
- Housing lotteries are open for one- and two-bedroom co-ops priced between $120,000 and $140,000. - NYC Health + Hospitals reports lowest behavioral health staff turnover and vacancy rates in recent history. [↗](https://news.google.?oc=5)
